name: OnAirwithRyanSeacrest
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hear snippets from Ryan Seacrest including interviews with major celebrities, your favorite music artists, and the latest entertainment news. Updated daily. 

After enabling this skill, say “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear On Air with Ryan Seacrest content in your flash briefing. 

Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to edit the order of content feeds in your news update.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
